definition: cloth/to declare/to announce/to spread/to make known

sentences.english: Toilet and bidet, also with a place to change baby's diapers.
sentences.chinese: 卫生间和洗脚池，还有婴儿的尿布台。

sentences.english: She blenches at the very thought of changing a baby's dirty nappy.
sentences.chinese: 她一想到给婴儿换脏尿布就不愿意。

sentences.english: In some sense, they both need the same amount of diapers.
sentences.chinese: 从某种意义上说，他们需要相同数量的尿布。

sentences.english: I tell you that one stork dropped the little tyke off in a diaper.
sentences.chinese: 我告诉你他是一只鹳咬着尿布扔下来的。

sentences.english: The bisabolol can quickly relieve and prevent diaper rash.
sentences.chinese: 红没药醇能迅速缓减和预防尿布疹等情况。

sentences.english: He has just diapered his granddaughter.
sentences.chinese: 他刚给孙女儿换完尿布。

sentences.english: I cloth diapered two kids and LOVED every minute of it.
sentences.chinese: 我的两个小孩都使用尿布，而且非常喜欢。

sentences.english: Puffy, plasticky packages of Doggie Depends stocked in the pantry.
sentences.chinese: 橱柜堆满鼓鼓的塑料包装狗尿布。

sentences.english: I was starting to do some new movements. I had the sheets down to the top of my wet nappy.
sentences.chinese: 我把被子蹬到湿尿布上。

sentences.english: And nappy cream is like caviar for toddles, best served straight from the bottom.
sentences.chinese: 尿布霜对蹒跚学步的小孩子就有如鱼子酱。

sentences.english: So they were the storehouse for  diapers and formula.
sentences.chinese: 这样，那里就成为了贮存尿布和配方奶粉的仓库。

sentences.english: They are great just to keep in your purse or diaper bag for on the go.
sentences.chinese: 在钱袋或是尿布包里揣上一包会很方便。

sentences.english: Time for a feeding and time for a diapering.
sentences.chinese: 是到了喂奶，换尿布的时候了。

sentences.english: Slip a diaper under the tush, and the baby coos?
sentences.chinese: 垫一片尿布在婴儿的小屁股下，婴儿只会咕咕地低吟？

sentences.english: A diaper-changing area will also be available onsite.
sentences.chinese: 换尿布的地方也布置在现场。

definition: to support a child (or invalid etc) while he or she urinates
